name: Zany Golf
overview: Miniature Golf Turned On Its Head It's unbelieve-a-ball! This whacky game breaks all the laws - even the laws of physics! Chase moving holes and avoid devastating laser blasts. It's like nine addicting arcade games in one. Hamburger Hill. Get an ace..... or indigestion! Pinball Palace. Bounce off both bumpers or you'll flip out. Chaotic Castle. Beware the a-MAZE-ing garden path! Energy Enigma. Get zapped up to the mezzanine or blasted into oblivion.
